column1: Travel Executive
column2: We are seeking a dynamic and customer-focused Travel Executive to join our BPO team in Gurugram. The ideal candidate will be responsible for assisting clients with their travel needs, including booking flights, hotels, and other travel-related services. This role requires excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and a passion for delivering outstanding customer service.  Role & responsibilities     Customer Service:  Handle incoming calls and emails from clients regarding travel inquiries, reservations, cancellations, and other travel-related issues. Travel Booking:  Assist clients in booking flights, hotels, car rentals, and other travel services using our booking systems and tools. Problem Resolution:  Address and resolve customer complaints and issues promptly and efficiently. Itinerary Planning:  Provide clients with detailed travel itineraries and ensure all travel arrangements are accurately documented. Sales Support:  Offer additional travel products and services to clients to enhance their travel experience. Documentation:  Maintain accurate records of client interactions, transactions, and feedback. Team Collaboration:  Work closely with other team members and departments to ensure seamless service delivery and client satisfaction. Preferred candidate profile     Education:  Diploma in Travel and Tourism or related field. Graduates and undergraduates are both welcome to apply. Experience:  Freshers are encouraged to apply; previous experience in a travel-related role is a plus. Skills: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Strong organizational and time-management abilities Proficiency in using travel booking systems and MS Office applications Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple tasks simultaneously Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail Perks and benefits   Incentives  Both Side Cabs For further details, please contact Jemi at 8744000152 or share your Resume at jemi@expertstaffingsolutions.in

column2: Role & responsibilities   Graduate or Undergrads with International Chat/customer service (US) experience Candidates are required to have excellent communication skills - written and oral. Ability to comprehend US customer needs through calls, translate the need into process query and provide the right resolution in a clear and concise manner Ability to understand the conversation between the chat bot and customer and pick up from there and continue Customer conversation. Preferably has worked on dual concurrency. Ability to multitask and work with multiple tools in order to provide the best resolution Functional knowledge of using CRM solution and MS Excel Domain knowledge of US Customer Service, preferably Telecom industry Job requires the candidate to be confident, probe for responses and empathize with customers. Needs to be customer centric with strong conversational skills Good written and verbal communication skills. Preferred candidate profile    Flexible with shifts including Night Shifts. column2: Role & responsibilities   Renewal Retention Officer required for Coimbatore - 4 open positions, Trichy - 2 open positions,    Job Description: * Make calls to the customer for their renewal payments. * Should be responsible for cross-selling & up-selling * Resolve all the customer queries. * Give a good assistance to the customer about health insurance & make sales. * Maintain accurate record of all calls made and received. * To achieve monthly targets. Job Requirements: Experience: Minimum 1 Year sales experience Qualification: 12th or Any graduate Salary: 15K to 20K plus incentives Good at English communication Interview Mode: Face to Face  Telecalling    Chennai - Kannada speaking - 5, Malayalam - 5, Hindi - 5, Tamil Nungambakkam - 2  Job Description: * Take inbound, outbound calls, answer questions, and document activities in the CRM * Make outbound calls to agents to motivate and update the commission structure. * Assist with sales activities, documenting leads, and managing databases * Gather and document sales data, such as meetings and appointments, in CRM, including details of agents * Communicate with agents regarding policy activation. * Perform other duties as assigned Job Requirements: Experience: Fresher or experienced Qualification: 12th or Any graduate Salary: 15K to 18K plus incentives Good at English communication Interview Mode: Face to Face Interested can contact me @ 73589 51352

column1: Customer Care Specialist
column2: About NIIT NIIT provides comprehensive and scalable managed training services for learning administration that maps directly to our customer needs. Training is our business and passion. We are one of the largest training outsourcing providers in the world. NIIT delivers and administers 75,000 days of training each year, in 18 languages. We have designed and developed over 50,000 days of classroom training and 20,000 hours of web-based training localized to more than 25 languages. NIIT is a global service provider. We have a presence in more than 40 countries. NIIT is looking for Customer Support Representative for Gurgaon location. Interested candidates can share their resume on  Gourav.Roy@niitmts.com  or WhatsApp their resume-: Gourav@9354482536 Link for our website: https://www.niit.com/mts/ Job Role   Customer Support Executive (Voice Profile) Experience   0 to 29 Month Job   Location  ??Gurgaon Working   days  ??5 days working, Rotational night shifts ( Fixed Sat- Sun Off ) Job Overview  ??The candidate is expected to cater to inbound calls and chats in apt and professional way. Imparting a complete and accurate product information which leads prospects/customers to opt for offered courses. Ensuring business and customer centric approach with multitasking skills. Roles and Responsibilities- Customer Service through calls Ensure timely and accurate service delivery at defined productivity levels Build client & domain knowledge to be able to deliver a resolution on the first conversation Ensure adherence to Client Service Level Agreements(SLAs) like Customer Satisfaction, Service Level, Handle Time & Customer Effort Maintain Internal Service Attendance & Accountability policies Execute issue /query & Client level delivery quality on calls Adhere to Customer resolution and ensure proper documentation &follow-up Identify, share and support operational improvements Desired Candidate Profile- Good Communication skills & Inter-personal relations Good sales knowledge Ability to handle pressure Customer centric Active listener Must be graduate. NIIT is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other protected characteristic
